entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 7:55 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:55 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023
